code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import reducers from'./reducers';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import logger from'redux-logger';import{LOGOUT_SUCCESS}from'./actions/actionTypes';const composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;const appReducer=combineReducers(reducers);let middleware=[thunk];if(process.env.NODE_ENV!=='production'){middleware=[...middleware,logger];}else{middleware=[...middleware];}const rootReducer=(state,action)=>{if(action.type===LOGOUT_SUCCESS){state=undefined;}return appReducer(state,action);};const store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(...middleware)));export default store;
